subs.text: Nobody thinks of social media apps like Bluesky, Mastodon, Threads, etc as part of a content management system. But if they are somewhat textcasting oriented, and have feeds that are properly configured, then yes -- you can have people write for publication using such a well-equipped social network.
Have you noticed that news articles take forever to get to the point. I very often give up after a dozen paragraphs of this and that. Whatever happened to don't bury the lede?
I asked for an ancient rock band performing on stage in the middle of the Arizona desert, and the audience members are all cacti, and theyâ€™re partying and grooving on the tunes.
Ancient band in Arizona desert with cacti audience.
